thread.title: BRIEF-Firstar Panel Technology's Share Trade To Halt As Shares Pledged By Owner, Controlling Shareholder Triggered Margin Call

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Firstar Panel Technology's Share Trade To Halt As Shares Pledged By Owner, Controlling Shareholder Triggered Margin Call

organizations.name: reuters) - zhejiang firstar panel technology co ltd

text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Zhejiang Firstar Panel Technology Co Ltd :
* SAYS SHARE TRADE TO HALT FROM FEB 7 AS COMPANY SHARES PLEDGED BY OWNER AND CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER HAVE TRIGGERED MARGIN CALL Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2sbAVcL Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
